laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative, with fewer than five white blood cells per high-powered field.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Aerobic and anaerobic cultures of aspirate
Final bacterial cultures (after irrigation and debridement)
Intraoperative cultures from aspirated joint fluid
laboratory_examinations.findings: Grew methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, susceptible to vancomycin, gentamicin, clindamycin, and sulfamethoxazole-trimethoprim; resistant to nafcillin and erythromycin.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Previously negative cultures not showing growth during multiple tests.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Presence of viable cocci ranging from single cells to large aggregates of clusters.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Distribution of biofilm was patchy, similar to that seen in tissue samples.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Presence of Staphylococcus aureus mRNA detected, no presence of Staphylococcus epidermidis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicated viable bacteria present at the time of explant.
